history.proof: intros m n H. srun best use: Zis_gcd_for_euclid2, Znumtheory.rel_prime_sym, rel_prime_mult unfold: rel_prime.

exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : Z H : rel_prime m n Unable to unify "m" with "m * m + n * n".
In environment m, n : Z H : rel_prime m n Unable to unify "rel_prime m n" with "rel_prime (m + (m * m + n * n)) (m - (m * m + n * n))".
The reference distinct_parity_two_together was not found in the current environment.
In environment m, n : Z H : rel_prime m n Unable to unify "Zis_gcd (?M1844 * ?M1844) (?M1845 * ?M1845) 1" with "Zis_gcd (m - (m * m + n * n)) (m + (m * m + n * n)) 1".
In environment m, n : Z H : rel_prime m n Unable to unify "rel_prime m n" with "Zis_gcd (m - (m * m + n * n)) (m + (m * m + n * n)) 1".

original: intros m n H. apply relp_sum. apply prop1. - apply H. - apply distinct_parity_two_together. apply prop2. apply H.
